channel.title: Major on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Major on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 9 is available
item.description: It’s finally here! PrestaShop 9 is available for download. This new version brings a modernized architecture, new developer tools, and powerful features designed to support the future of ecommerce.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.0 RC1 is now available!
item.description: The first Release Candidate of PrestaShop 9.0 is now available for testing. This is a significant milestone in the development cycle, and we encourage all users to test it thoroughly.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.0 beta is now available!
item.description: The first beta version of PrestaShop 9.0 is now available for testing. This version includes many new features and improvements, a new Hummingbird theme, a new Admin API, PHP 8.4 and Symfony 6.4 support, many bug fixes, and a significant codebase cleanup. Read on to learn more about the new features and improvements.

item.title: PrestaShop 9 Alpha 1 is Available!
item.description: Here it is. The first public alpha of PrestaShop 9 is available. We decided it was time to share with you the first results of our work on PrestaShop 9.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0 Is Available
item.description: The maintainers team is pleased to announce that PrestaShop 8.0 is officially available.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0 Release Candidate Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: The maintainers team is pleased to announce the first release candidate of PrestaShop 8.0.

item.title: Migrate your solutions from PrestaShop 1.7 to 8.0
item.description: PrestaShop 8 beta version was released last week. If you are a developer in our ecosystem, create modules or themes, and have clients working with PrestaShop, this is an excellent opportunity to spend some time with this version and test your solutions.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0 beta is open for feedback!
item.description: The public beta version of PrestaShop 8.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 released!
item.description: Here it is! All singin’ all dancin’: Prestashop 1.7.0.0 is ready for you to explore!

item.title: Here comes PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 4!
item.description: Three weeks ago we released PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 3. Since then, and with the help of the community, we’ve been working on it to fix the bugs you’ve reported and to keep improving this new version. We’re now releasing PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 4 version, so we can keep gathering feedback and make sure that the final and stable version will be the best it can be!

item.title: Test PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 3 now!
item.description: Here it is. After two internal alpha versions, we’re happy to present to you this public alpha release of PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 – the first in a series of public alpha/beta/RC versions that we intend to release over several weeks, in order to gather feedback and make sure that the final and stable version is the best it can be!
